data.name: General
data.description: Unstructured, long description of the activity

data.name: Objectives
data.description: Specific objectives for the activity, e.g. taken from logical framework

data.description: Details of groups that are intended to benefit from the activity

data.name: Other
data.description: For miscellaneous use. A further classification or breakdown may be included in the narrative
